languages.text: Wielder's Single shot targets gain +50% Dodge against this attack, but Single shot gains +30% Crit Damage and +100% Overpenetration on Critical Hits

traits.locale_text: Wielder's Single shot targets gain +50% Dodge against this attack, but Single shot gains +30% Crit Damage and +100% Overpenetration on Critical Hits

languages.text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночных выстрелов{/g} персонажа получает +50% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от таких выстрелов. Но если выстрел достигает цели и {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}, оно получает +30% к критическому урону и +100% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The target of the wearer's single-shot attack gains +50% dodge against that attack. But if this attack hits and scores a critical hit, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% overpenetration.

The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısının hedefi, bu saldırıya karşı +%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Ancak saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşürse +%30 daha fazla kritik hasar verir ve +%100 {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}delip geçme{/g} değeri kazanır.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısının hedefi, bu saldırıya karşı +%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Takan kişinin tek atış saldırısının hedefi, bu saldırıya karşı +%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Ancak saldırı vurur ve kritik vuruşa dönüşürse +%30 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} verir ve +%100 delip geçme değeri kazanır.

languages.text: El objetivo del ataque de un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}solo disparo{/g} del portador obtiene un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra ese ataque, pero si el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} y provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, inflige un +30 % de daño crítico adicional y gana un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo del ataque de un solo disparo del portador obtiene un +50 % de esquiva contra ese ataque, pero si el ataque impacta y provoca un impacto crítico, inflige un +30 % de daño crítico adicional y gana un +100 % de sobrepenetración.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}攻击目标时，目标针对此次单发射击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高50%，但如果此次射击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标且造成暴击，则造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害提高30%，且{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}提高100%。
languages.original_text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用单发射击攻击目标时，目标针对此次单发射击的闪避提高50%，但如果此次射击命中目标且造成暴击，则造成的暴击伤害提高30%，且过度穿透提高100%。

languages.text: Das Ziel des {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschussangriffs{/g} des Trägers erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen diesen Angriff. Aber wenn der Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} und einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, verursacht er +30 % mehr kritischen Schaden und gewährt +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel des Einzelschussangriffs des Trägers erhält +50 % Ausweichen gegen diesen Angriff. Aber wenn der Angriff trifft und einen kritischen Treffer erzielt, verursacht er +30 % mehr kritischen Schaden und gewährt +100 % Überdurchdringung.

languages.text: La cible de l'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} du porteur gagne +50 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} contre cette attaque. Mais si l'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} et inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, elle inflige +30 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires et gagne +100 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible de l'attaque au coup par coup du porteur gagne +50 % à l'esquive contre cette attaque. Mais si l'attaque touche et inflige un coup critique, elle inflige +30 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires et gagne +100 % à la surpénétration.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃攻撃{/g}のターゲットは、その攻撃に対して+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を付与される。しかし、この攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となった場合、クリティカルダメージが+30%増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}が+100%される。
languages.original_text: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の単発射撃攻撃のターゲットは、その攻撃に対して+50%の回避を付与される。しかし、この攻撃が命中し、クリティカルヒットとなった場合、クリティカルダメージが+30%増加し、過貫通が+100%される。
使用者の単発射撃攻撃のターゲットは、その攻撃に対して+50%の回避を付与される。しかし、この攻撃が命中し、クリティカルヒットとなった場合、クリティカルダメージが+30%増加し、過貫通が+100%される。

languages.text: Цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночных выстрелов{/g} персонажа получает +50% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от таких выстрелов. Но если выстрел достигает цели и {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}, оно получает +30% к критическому урону и +100% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g}.

But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель одиночных выстрелов персонажа получает +50% к шансу уклониться от таких выстрелов. Но если выстрел достигает цели и попадание становится критическим, оно получает +30% к критическому урону и +100% к сквозному пробитию.

Цель одиночных выстрелов персонажа получает +50% к шансу уклониться от таких выстрелов. Но если выстрел достигает цели и попадание становится критическим, оно получает +30% к критическому урону и +100% к сквозному пробитию.
